         </path>
        </g>
       </g>
      </svg>
     </a>

             Trooping the Colour to Be Scaled Down Again
            </a>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">

         <div class="custom-item prince-charles-camilla-royal-tour-greece-2021 column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="The Royals" data-vars-position="4" href="/society/tradition/a35886831/prince-charles-camilla-royal-tour-greece-2021/">

          <div class="custom-item-inner">

           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Long Reads" data-vars-position="4" href="/style/fashion-trends/a35449458/farfetch-ecommerce-site/">
             Is Farfetch the New Barneys?
            </a>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">
             <!-- shared/byline -->
             <div class="byline custom-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
              By
              <span class="byline-name" itemprop="name" rel="author">
               Kristen Bateman
              </span>
             </div>
             <!-- / shared/byline -->
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="custom-item college-gap-year-covid-19-pandemic column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Long Reads" data-vars-position="5" href="/society/money-and-power/a35437879/college-gap-year-covid-19-pandemic/">

           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">

             Should You Take a Gap Year Before College?
            </a>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">

        <h2 class="feed-block-column-heading">
         <a href="/best-movies/">

        </h2>
       </div>
       <div class="feed-block-column-content" data-vars-block-curation="Collection" data-vars-block-id="d3162c98-b61c-453f-90d1-3bb1305d617b" data-vars-block-slot="7" data-vars-block-type="3 Column Block">
        <div class="custom-item how-to-watch-trial-of-the-chicago-7 image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Movies" data-vars-position="1" href="/leisure/arts-and-culture/a35867241/how-to-watch-trial-of-the-chicago-7/">
           <img alt="the trial of the chicago 7" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/trial-1616022364.jpg?crop=0.655xw:1.00xh;0.142xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/trial-1616022364.jpg?crop=0.655xw:1.00xh;0.142xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/trial-1616022364.jpg?crop=0.655xw:1.00xh;0.142xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/trial-1616022364.jpg?crop=0.655xw:1.00xh;0.142xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/trial-1616022364.jpg?crop=0.655xw:1.00xh;0.142xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Movies" data-vars-position="1" href="/leisure/arts-and-culture/a35867241/how-to-watch-trial-of-the-chicago-7/">
            How To Watch The Trial of the Chicago 7 Online
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">

        </div>
        <div class="custom-item how-to-watch-minari image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Movies" data-vars-position="2" href="/leisure/arts-and-culture/a35843652/how-to-watch-minari/">

       <div class="feed-block-header">
        <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
         <a href="https://www.townandcountrymag.com/style/beauty-products/">

       <div class="feed-block-content" data-vars-block-curation="Curated" data-vars-block-id="26feab8c-d18f-4ae4-b539-934b1f6abd6f" data-vars-block-slot="10" data-vars-block-type="4 Across Block">
        <div class="custom-item best-beauty-products-2020 image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Beauty" data-vars-position="1" href="/style/beauty-products/g35032185/best-beauty-products-2020/">

          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Beauty" data-vars-position="1" href="/style/beauty-products/g35032185/best-beauty-products-2020/">
            The Best Beauty Launches of 2020
           </a>
           <span class="custom-item-meta">
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="custom-item how-to-design-bespoke-fragrance-scent-perfume image-stacked">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Beauty" data-vars-position="2" href="/style/beauty-products/a34864507/how-to-design-bespoke-fragrance-scent-perfume/">
           <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/retro-woman-with-magical-perfume-royalty-free-image-1607029205.?crop=0.899xw:0.899xh;0.0603xw,0.101xh&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
           </span>

        <div class="custom-item prince-harry-princess-dianas-death-note-bereaved-children">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="The Latest From T&amp;C" data-vars-position="6" href="/society/tradition/a35885829/prince-harry-princess-dianas-death-note-bereaved-children/">
